boat.full_description:
Worm is a Mouse pram built from plans in 2010 and is tender to Robinetta. She is the best tender one could imagine. She rows well and can take three adults. She hardly ever takes a drop of water in whilst being towed.

In company with Robinetta, she's circumnavigated the islands of Britain, Ireland and Mainland (Orkney) and cruised much of the coast of Brittany. Iain's design proposes a gunter rig for the Mouse Pram proposed a gunter rig. Worm has a standing lug
boat.name: Worm
boat.short_description: Worm was built from plans and is tender to Robinetta
